ygData.subject: Re: RE: [Ever Quest] new armor...
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/1/99 10:44:08 AM Eastern Standard Time, lwhitmore@dsti.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/1/99 10:44:08 AM Eastern Standard Time,
lwhitmore@... writes:

<<
Was anyone online during the DE war last night.. What did you think of it
all?
>>

Yeah I was. A pitiful GM event for sure. They organized an event that thier
Hardware could not support. Entire servers crashing, zones crashing, random
disconnects, random zone teleports.

A lot of people were complaining about how hard it was to kill them and how
the zones were huge massacre areas, even for high lvl groups (I don't really
have a problem with this, a war is a war and if it is a hard one to survive
that's ok with me). People were also losing tons of experience as the NPCs
were camped at people's bind respawn spots - (a friend of mine lost 3 bubbles
before he turned off his machine to stop respawning). We organized an army
outside HH PASS to retake the zone - about 40 players grouped up - after
getting organized and planning our attack - we zone in and I disconnected (I
assume many others did as well). I tried to get back on for an hour, but
since I was now inside HH Pass, I could not log in.

Thanks VERANT! - That was soooooo much fun

Wizaro Wrathcaster
Solusek Ro
